attributes.action: All Schools to have a soft play/calm room for Disabled Children with ADHD/Autism
attributes.additional_details:
A Law to be brought in for all schools in England and Wales to have a soft play/ Calming room for children with ADHD, Autism, Asperger’s within their establishment.

This is vital to the childs saftey when they may be having a bad turn or feel they can not cope at times within a school setting and minimize the risk of a child hurting them self or having to be unnecessary restraint by teachers, which causes even more distress to a child who has one of the above diagonsis.
